title: Paradise lost: The Firebird by Stravinsky from Allegro non Troppo
brief_description: Excerpt from Bruno Bozzetto’s “Allegro Non Troppo”. Adam and Eve refuse to be tempted and the snake which eats the forbidden fruit tumbles through a myriad futuristic psychedelia. Music from Stravinsky’s “Firebird”. Animation by Walter Cavazzuti. No commentary, music only. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
